revised_title: Quadrupole Moment's Effect on Ion-Linear Molecule Collisions
tldr: The article calculates rate coefficients for hitting collisions between ions and linear molecules with a quadrupole moment using the semi-classical adiabatic invariance method. The results are presented in two graphs, showing the impact of the quadrupole moment on the rate coefficients. The study compares the findings with measured rate coefficients of some proton and deuteron transfer reactions.
